title: 13.3 Worksheet
content:
« Worked Examples 13.3.1Beta Implementation Worksheet » Caches and the Memory Hierarchy This worksheet contains exercises for the lecture, selected from old quiz problems. If you can successfully answer the questions on the worksheet, you’ve mastered the material for the lecture! We’ve also included a link to the answers, but you’ll get the most out of the worksheet if you work on the exercises before reading the answers.
Click here to open worksheet PDF (file size: 1.2MB) in a new window.
Click here to open answer PDF in a new window.
